channel.title: Version 5.1 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.1.2 (2022-07-18) Fixes [bug] print: reset mermaid theme to light #313 [bug] mermaid: header is showing up in FF #311 5.1.1 (2022-07-15) Fixes [bug] tags: donâ€™t count tags if page is hidden #310 5.1.0 (2022-07-15) Enhancements [feature][change] print: make print url deterministic #309 [feature] theme: allow overriding partials for output formats #308
